Title: Mitron
Writer: Tharun Bhascker Dhaassyam (original story), Sharib Hashmi (adapted by)
Actors: Maya Ben, Jackky Bhagnani, Panna Bhen, Perlene Bhersaina
Plot: Jai "Jackky Bhagnani", born and brought up with middle-class values, has a 'take it easy' approach to life. Since he doesn't believe in a herd mentality, he and his two best friends, Raunak...
